text: 2.14 Nam 22–24, 25.1-3, 31.16, Lo 23.4, Apo 15.29, 1 Ko 6.13, 8.9, 2 Pi 2.15, Jud 11 Pen takaw ogɨnap mɨdeb agak. Binɨb nɨbi ogɨnap, Balam takaw agñolɨgup ak dɨl kɨdek gebal agak. Bɨ Balam anɨb ak, bɨ Balak nop tɨmud wukek nɨm, am yepɨs gek, Yislel binɨb okok apyap pakɨlɨlak agak. Tap ñɨŋeb tap yokɨp sɨbogɨlak okok ñɨbɨlɨg, bin si bɨ si gɨlɨg gɨlak agak.
